sentences.sContent: Neither the lizard nor the glass has any secrets.
sentences.sContent_eng: Neither the lizard nor the glass has any secrets.
sentences.sCn: 无论是蜥蜴还是玻璃，都没有任何秘密。

sentences.sContent: Meetings are just one symptom of an organization run by the lizard brain.
sentences.sContent_eng: Meetings are just one symptom of an organization run by the lizard brain.
sentences.sCn: 会海只是这类靠蜥蜴脑运作的组织的一个症状。

sentences.sContent: When air cools at night, dew collects on the lizard's skin and is pulled to its mouth by capillary action.
sentences.sContent_eng: When air cools at night, dew collects on the lizard's skin and is pulled to its mouth by capillary action.
sentences.sCn: 待晚间空气温度下降，凝结在蜥蜴皮肤上的露珠就可以通过毛细管作用输送到它的口中。

trans.tranOther: a type of reptile that has four legs and a long tail
